name: Quelling the Nepian Threat
description: It seems like the Nepian blood is working! These herbs are looking exceptionally more lush and vibrant than before adding the blood. Traveler, I wonder if we might actually be on to something here. You see, I have been trying to find a solution to the famine for quite some time myself. I have spent countless years researching the valley's curse. Never, until now, have I made any significant discoveries. Thanks to you, traveler, I now feel hopeful for the first time since I can rememberThe blood seems like it works - but we need more! There are some more Nepian Grunts, just southeast of here. Please, bring me more of their blood.Be warned traveler, these Nepian are stronger than the last ones you faced.
requirements: ___ wants you to collect 10 phials of Lesser Nepian blood
completiontext: Traveler! Welcome back! Have you collected what is required?
